items.question: What is self check-in?
items.answer: Self check-in lets customers join your waitlist without staff assistance. They scan a QR code, visit a link, or use a tablet kiosk to enter their details and join the queue.

items.question: Do guests need the app to use self check-in?
items.answer: No. Self check-in works in any web browser. Guests scan a QR code or tap a link—no app download required.

items.question: How does self-check-in work during rush?
items.answer: Self check-in actually shines during rush hours. Instead of a line at the host stand, guests join from their phones while waiting outside, at the bar, or even from their car.

items.question: Can I limit who can self check-in?
items.answer: Yes! You can enable geo-fencing to only allow check-ins from nearby locations, set party size limits, or disable self check-in entirely during certain hours.

items.question: Can I customize the check-in page to match my brand?
items.answer: Absolutely. Add your logo, choose your brand colors, customize the welcome message, and select which fields to show (name, phone, party size, seating preferences, etc.).

items.question: What stops people from joining when they're not really there?
items.answer: Geo-fencing limits check-ins to your location radius. You can also require phone verification or set short expiration windows for spots that aren't confirmed.
